did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc: Publications, printed materials, photographs, video recordings.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Programs, photographs, books, serials, papers, conference materials, and videos documenting the Club's activities and recent literature on transgender themes, including intersexuality. Books and serials from their library are cataloged individually.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: The Mid-Hudson Valley Transgender Association (MHVTA) is a support group for transgender people in the Hudson Valley region of New York State and New Jersey. Meetings have been held in Poughkeepsie, New York and other cities.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Programs, photographs, books, serials, papers, conference materials, and videos documenting the Club's activities and recent literature on transgender themes, including intersexuality. Books and serials from their library are cataloged individually.

accessrestrict.p: Folder 27 from Box 2 and Folders 3, 59 from Box 3 are restricted until January 2041.

userestrict.p: Box 5: No reproductions or images, no sharing of people's contact information. Material may not be shared online or published until Jan 2041.
Researchers are asked to sign a form agreeing to abide by these restrictions.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Mid-Hudson Valley Transgender Association, #7832. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
